languages.text: Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Archon is alive.
languages.original_text: Пока Назракей жив, существа под его предводительством получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, +4 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, а также восстанавливают <u>(от 12 до 30)</u> здоровья каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% armour, +4 deflection, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every turn while the Archon is alive.

Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Archon is alive.

traits.locale_text: Пока Назракей жив, существа под его предводительством получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g}, +4 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, а также восстанавливают <u>(от 12 до 30)</u> каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

Пока Назракей жив, существа под его предводительством получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g}, +4 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, а также восстанавливают <u>(от 12 до 30)</u> каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

languages.text: 只要纳札骸还活着，所有受纳札骸指挥的生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}恢复<u>12-30</u>点生命值，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高20%，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高4点。
languages.original_text: Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Archon is alive.

traits.locale_text: 只要纳札骸还活着，所有受纳札骸指挥的生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}恢复<u>12-30</u>点生命值，{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}提高20%，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高4点。

languages.text: ナズラクヘイの指揮下にいる生物はアーコンが生きている間、+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と+4の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を得て、毎回の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターンで{/g}<u>（12から30まで）</u>に回復する。
languages.original_text: Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Archon is alive.

traits.locale_text: ナズラクヘイの指揮下にいる生物はアーコンが生きている間、+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}と+4の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を得て、毎回の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターンで{/g}<u>（12から30まで）</u>に回復する。

languages.text: Kreaturen unter Nazrakheis Befehl erhalten in jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, in dem Archon am Leben ist, +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und <u>(12 bis 30)</u> Heilung.
languages.original_text: Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Archon is alive.

traits.locale_text: Kreaturen unter Nazrakheis Befehl erlangen +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} und Heilung für <u>(von 12 bis 30)</u>, und zwar in jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, solange Archon am Leben ist.

languages.text: Les créatures sous le commandement de Nazrakhei bénéficient de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +4 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, et se soignent à hauteur de <u>(de 12 à 30)</u> par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} tant que l'Archonte est en vie.
languages.original_text: Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Archon is alive.

traits.locale_text: Les créatures sous le commandement de Nazrakhei bénéficient de +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et +4 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, et se soignent à hauteur de <u>(de 12 à 30)</u> par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} tant que l'Archonte est en vie.

languages.text: Nazrakhei'in emri altındaki yaratıklar, Arkon hayattayken +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazanırlar. Ayrıca her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} <u>(12 ila 30)</u> sağlık puanı iyileşirler.
languages.original_text: Creatures under Nazrakhei's command gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and heal for <u>(from 12 to 30)</u> every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Archon is alive.
